name: Create_a_flowchart
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Choose a SmartArt Graphic' dialog box, select 'Process' category.
Choose a flowchart layout that suits your needs and click 'OK'.
A blank flowchart will be inserted into your document.
To add shapes to the flowchart, click on the existing shapes and use the 'Add Shape' button in the 'Create Graphic' group.
To connect the shapes, click on the shape you want to connect from, and then click on the shape you want to connect to.
To add text to the shapes, simply click inside the shape and start typing.
Continue adding shapes, connecting them, and adding text until your flowchart is complete.
Save the document when you're done.
